situation.title: Birthdays and anniversaries
situation.meta_description: Celebrations of birthdays or anniversaries can only be carried out among your closest family and loved ones (in particular your partner).

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

At a party (celebration, reception etc.) 10 people can be present if it is held inside and 50 people if outside. 

If you are already organizing a celebration with your close family, please take the presence of higher risk groups, especially grandparents into consideration. Follow all hygienic regulations e.g. regular ventilation of the room to ensure enough fresh air, don't shout or sing because both of these activities lead to higher transmission of respiratory droplets. If you want to take preventative measures you can wear a mask, disinfect your hands before congratulating someone and sit further apart. Wash your hands before you eat as well.

Bars, clubs, restaurants, cafés and other similar facilities are open. However, specific hygiene rules apply - a maximum of 4 people can sit at a table, while the total capacity of the restaurant may be filled to a maximum of 50%. Businesses must also close at no later than 10 PM.
